title: Near infrared single photon detection using Ge-on-Si heterostructures
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This grant is part of a larger activity in which it is linked to other grants at other universities. To date the work has resulted in publications and conferences.
findingsText: This work is part of a larger activity with other universities. We have carried out detailed device processing based upon designs provided by other partners, which has resulted in very promising devices. Device evolution will continue beyond the grant to result in better designs being realised. Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software)
